titles: The languishing lady; or, The false-hearted lovers vnspeakable cruelty. To an excellent new tune.
publisher: Printed for C[harles]. Bates, next door to the Crown-Tavern in West-Smithfield.,
notes: Publisher's name, place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "VVelcome death, the cure of all my sorrow ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
